errors.BLOCKED_USER: Too many failed login attempts, user blocked temporarely
errors.SERVER_TIMEOUT_CONNECTION_ERROR: Server is not responding, connection error

common.DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_ITEM: Do you really want to delete this item?

landing.HEAD: Find your Fireteam
landing.STARTINGINFO: Destiny 2 TeamFinder is an app where players can find other guardians to play with. Easily set up a post of whatever activity you want to do and watch as people join. You can also check out your own loadout and others.
infoCardsDesc: Set up your own forum post of whatever raid, strike og other activity you want to complete. You can also search for already created posts and join waiting guardians.

Check out your own loadout right here on the app. You will also be able to check out the loadouts of players joining your post on the forum. This is very neat, considering you might require sertain weapons to be eqipped.
Simply invite the guardians joining your post by a /invite command ingame. This is easily done by us copying the invite link and ID number for you
infoCards2Desc: Vue is an open-source JavaScript framework used for making user interfaces and simple apps. It combines HTML, JS and CSS into one file, and makes it really easy to re-use code.
Node.js is an open-source JavaScript runtime enviroment that executes JavaScript code outside of a webbrowser.
MongoDB is a document oriented NoSQL database program. MongoDB uses JSON-like documents for data storage and is eary to query
landing.BUY_ME_A_COFFEE_DESCRIPTION: I'm doing my best to provide you a good experience when using my apps, so if you like what I'm doing and wish to say "thanks!", please click the button and buy me a coffee.
landing.DESCRIPTION_VUE: This project is created to help other web developers create a basic VueJS app in an easy way.
landing.DESCRIPTION_API: Demo is also linked to a Node.js express.js MongoDB JWT REST API project that shows how this frontend can be integrated to an API.

home.TITLE: Protected Home
home.DESCRIPTION: This page is only available privately when the users log in with their credentials
home.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: You must verify your account by clicking the link sent to your E-mail to be able to enjoy all our app features

about.TITLE: About us
about.WELCOME: Welcome to the unofficial Destiny 2 teamfinder!
about.WHATTODO: Find a team and execute your mission seemless, fast and easy with the use of our teamfinder function, when you have created an account with us. You can simply use the karam system to give feedback directly to your team and individual players if the team.
about.THETEAM: The team consist of 4 students currently studying IT 2nd year at the University college of Souteast Norway, Bø. This website is a school project and our final exam in the subject «APP2000». The assignemt was to make an applicatio for a website, either an application from the professor or one application of our own choice approved by the professor.
about.INQURY: For any inquires please contact us on the follow platforms found in the footer.

login.TITLE: Login
login.DESCRIPTION:
This is a demo. Database resets every 30 mins. So anything you do will be lost after a short time.
E-mail: admin@admin.com
Password: 12345

forgotPassword.TITLE: Forgot my password
forgotPassword.DESCRIPTION: Enter your E-mail address so we can send you a message with instructions to recover your password
forgotPassword.RESET_EMAIL_SENT: We have sent a message to %{0} with instructions to recover your password
